resources.string: Please enter a valid email address

Symphony is a public music sharing app for fans and creators. You agree that all content MUST be original. Uploading copyrighted content is forbidden and subject to account removal and information being handed over to federal prosecutors if Symphony is contacted. Symphony stores your location to allow other users to discover your content. Your exact location is NEVER shared with other users and is only stored on the server as a means to make the app location aware. No location logging is enabled and only your most recent location is stored on our systems. Previous entries are removed on each location update. For more about privacy please see:
Privacy Policy
